me naraka wade karanne "etiselat" samagama ha ekthara jyothishawediyaku ekathu wela.paribhogikayata jyothisha palapala dakwimak lesa thamayi karanne.(me wage jyothisha palapala dakwim wenath durakathana simkad samagam walinuth karanawa.eewa wunath hodayi kiyala lekhakaya kiyanne naha.namuth etiselat wade thirisan gathiya wadiyen thiyenawa.) 567 amathuma osse liyapadinchi wela thamange upathata adala upan dinaya, welawa, palatha,disthrikkaya anuwa palapala dakwimak lesa thamayi meya karali gatha wenne.aththatama oogollo kawuruwath meke aththa naththa pariksha karanna balanna yanna epa kiyala mulinma kiyanna oona.nathnam me lipiye prayojana labenne horuntamayi.etiselat karana me wade rata boruwak.mekata sambandha jyothishawediyath mudal walata kadara kapati themparadu pudgalayek.meke palapala wisthara padanam wela thiyenne upan daththa anuwa parighanaka jyothisha mrudukangayakin lagnaya,nakatha,dashawa gananaya karala ee ee kotas walata(lagnaya,nakatha,..)adalawa patigatha karana lada palapala kotas ekathu karala sewa dayakayata asanna salaswimayi.meyin labena lagnaya,nakatha aadiya niwaradiyi.eyath upakramaye kotasak.mokada ethakota palapalath hari athi kiyana manasikathwayata asanna paminena nisayi.namuth mema palapala wisthara sampurnayen waradiyi.nikan boru warnana witharayi.onna modayantanam hodayi.eka sarekata kapenne ru. 5k witharak wunath boho pirisak meyata sambandha wunoth wishala mudalak adala samagamata labenawa.
pasugiya 30 wasara thula apage dahas sankhyatha ganudenukaruwan apage hithawath paribhogikayin saha mithuran amathima aadambara wana athara idiri 30 sarthakathwaya sandaha api bala sitimu.

nidahasin pasu gewunu haththa wasara thula thattu maru kramayata balaye siti pradhana paksha deka pasugiya janapathiwaranayen pasu prathama wathawata jathika aanduwa swarupayen ekata ekwa aandu karannata wiya.meya merata janathawata menma deshapalana sanskruthiyatada aluth deyak wu athara gatha wu wasara dekahamaraka kalaya thula jathika aanduwa thula katayuthu kala paksha deke nayakayanda mathi amathiwaruda ewani aanduwak thula thibiya yuthu gunanga sambandhawa anawabodhayen katayuthu kala bawak pahadiliwa penenanta thibini.pradhana paksha deka ekata ekwa aanduwak pihitawuwada ee thula paksha deka demangaka yana bawak rate janathawata daknata labini.thani pakshayak wisin aandu karana wita aanduwa thula athi abhyanthara arbuda anawaranaya wima walakwa ganima pinisa mathi amathiwaru athara winayak pawathwa gena giya namuth jathika aanduwa ema piliwetha sampurnayenma binda damamin ejapaye waradi shrilanipayath,shrilanipaye waradi ejapayath elipita wiwechanaya karannata pelambaini.wipakshaya mangin kala yuthu anawarana ha wiwechana aanduwa thula siti paksha deke idiri pela nayakayan yasa ageta sidu karathdi mahinda pramukha podujana peramuna nikan inda lakunu dama gaththeya.aanduwa thula sita ekineka wiwechanaya kirima magin pradhana paksha deka hithuwe thama thamange chanda goda wadiweyayi kiyaya.ese wuwath awasanaye sidu wuye ema deparshwayama wenuwata janathawa wenath wikalpayak thora ganimaya.
mesan bas keneku rate rajya nayakaya athin mewani jathika mattame agayimakata mita pera lakwela naha.ee wagema mesan bas unnahela hamadama bulath witak hapagena inna oona pirisak nowe.
